content: The Father of Stones hits hard but is also rather slow. Stick to his back and press the dodge button to recover quickly when flung backward from his roar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Father_of_Stones_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Father of Stones Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Father of Stones Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Father of Stones hits hard but is also rather slow. Stick to his back and press the dodge button to recover quickly when flung backward from his roar.
